snippet: Trade agreements with neighboring nations underscore China’s rising economic clout, as it competes more aggressively for deals and investment dollars.
abstract: China unveils series of measures aimed at strengthening financial tries with neighboring nations--and potentially weakening Asia's ties to United States; trade agreements underscore China’s rising economic clout, as it competes more aggressively for deals and investment dollars.

byline.original: By KEITH BRADSHER and ALEXANDRA STEVENSON
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Choe Sang-Hun from Seoul, South Korea; Michelle Innis from Sydney, Australia; and Hilda Wang from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: Trade agreements with neighboring nations underscore China’s rising economic clout, as it competes more aggressively for deals and investment dollars.

headline.main: China Builds Financial Ties to Neighbors
headline.print_headline: Beijing Builds Financial Ties to Neighbors

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
